backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, contact storage, gift plans, and birthday-range helpers with CRUD operations gated by authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing removed domain-related UI flows and cleaned-up frontend code paths with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and shared layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, and tabbed navigation for upcoming birthdays, contacts, and gift plans.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React form for creating and editing contacts with validation for birth data and optional notes, using React Query mutations.
Displays, searches, edits, and deletes contacts with loading and error states using contact hooks and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/components/DomainSlugSugges: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GiftPlanForm.tsx: Form for creating or updating a birthday gift plan, handling validation, submission, and contact selection.
frontend/src/components/GiftsManager.tsx: Manages listing, editing, deleting, and updating status of gift plans with dialogs, forms, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout UI using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting users to enter and save their profile name with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/UpcomingDashboar: Shows upcoming birthdays with filtering, search, time-window tabs, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContacts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting contacts using an actor API and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPlans.ts: Defines hooks to list and mutate birthday gift plans via an actor API with query invalidation and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider and hooks to manage login, identity loading, and error states using Dfinity AuthClient.
Provides a query hook to fetch upcoming birthdays within a given number of days using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Contains hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark theme variables and basic global styling.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting birthdays, calculating days until birthdays, next occurrences, and age calculations.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats nanosecond timestamps into human-readable relative or absolute time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project state, including fix requests to remove in-app domain configuration and related UI/code paths.
